STMTALRT.StatementText: The person or business represented by this report was a victim of identity theft. Contact at the number(s) provided before extending credit.

BTRUSTEE.TrusteeBusinessAddress: PO BOX 10443 BRISBANE ADELAIDE STREET QLD 4000

div.h1: This applicant currently holds several open accounts, with the newest account being {name} months old. The total default unpaid amount is {value}, indicating a history of potential financial distress. These insights help underwriters assess the creditworthiness of the applicant by providing a snapshot of their current financial obligations and the recency of their credit activity.
